page.title: 17LEISURE & RECREATION (contd)
page.content: Island". It is surrounded by water and reeds but we put down a sort of wooden bridge down to cross over. We have camped on the island for days on end. There are badgers on the island and sometimes we see them come out at night. Donna aged 11 My Dad has a lot of dogs. I go with him up on to the hill with them and we catch rabbits. Every Boxing Day lots of people meet on Baldwin's Beach with their greyhounds and whippets. Races are organised between the dogs to see which is the best.
